rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports numbers factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a number/status but lacks explicit calming language.
No bare negation or statement of absence/unlikelihood.
Reports a count of condors using a standard verb: "only 334 condors remained".
